name: product-price-tracker
description: A full-stack web application that enables users to search for products across multiple online sources and compare prices in real-time

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || true
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
